flavorText.text:
かざんの　ほらあなに　せいそく。
じゅうじの　ツメを　くいこませて
カベや　てんじょうを　はいまわる。

マグマの　ように　もえたぎる
けつえきが　からだを　ながれている。
かざんの　ほらあなに　せいそくする。

かざんの　ほらあなに　せいそく。
じゅうじの　ツメを　くいこませて
カベや　てんじょうを　はいまわる。

マグマの　ように　もえたぎる
けつえきが　からだを　ながれている。
かざんの　ほらあなに　せいそくする。

화산의 동굴에서 서식한다.
십자형의 발톱을 박아서
벽이나 천장을 돌아다닌다.

마그마처럼 타오르는
혈액이 몸에서 흐르고 있다.
화산의 동굴에 서식한다.

화산의 동굴에서 서식한다.
십자형의 발톱을 박아서
벽이나 천장을 돌아다닌다.

마그마처럼 타오르는
혈액이 몸에서 흐르고 있다.
화산의 동굴에 서식한다.

Son corps est composé d’acier brut
dont certaines parties ont fondu
à cause de sa propre chaleur.

Son corps est composé d’acier brut
dont certaines parties ont fondu
à cause de sa propre chaleur.

Il hante les grottes volcaniques. Il rampe au mur et
au plafond grâce à ses pieds en forme de croix.

Le sang de ce Pokémon des cratères bouillonne dans
son corps comme du magma.

Il hante les grottes volcaniques. Il rampe au mur et au plafond
grâce à ses pieds en forme de croix.

Le sang de ce Pokémon des cratères bouillonne dans
son corps comme du magma.

Es lebt in vulkanischen Höhlen. Mit seinen
kreuzförmigen Klauen kann es sogar an der Decke
laufen.

Das Blut, das durch seinen Körper fließt, brodelt
heiß wie Magma. Es lebt in vulkanischen Höhlen.

Es lebt in vulkanischen Höhlen. Mit seinen kreuzförmigen
Klauen kann es sogar an der Decke laufen.

Das Blut, das durch seinen Körper fließt, brodelt heiß
wie Magma. Es lebt in vulkanischen Höhlen.

Habita cuevas volcánicas. Cava con sus pies en forma
de cruz para trepar por techos y paredes.

Su sangre fluye ardiendo como si fuera magma.
Vive en cráteres de volcanes.

Habita cuevas volcánicas. Cava con sus pies en forma de cruz
para trepar por techos y paredes.

Su sangre fluye ardiendo como si fuera magma. Vive en
cráteres de volcanes.

Vive nelle cavità dei vulcani. Scava con i suoi piedi
a croce per scalare pareti e arrampicarsi sui soffitti.

Nel suo corpo scorre sangue che ribolle come magma.
Vive in antri all’interno di vulcani.

Vive nelle cavità dei vulcani. Scava con i suoi piedi a croce
per scalare pareti e arrampicarsi sui soffitti.

Nel suo corpo scorre sangue che ribolle come magma.
Vive in antri all’interno di vulcani.

It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

Its body is made of rugged steel.
However, it is partially melted in
spots because of its own heat.

Boiling blood, like magma, circulates
through its body. It makes its dwelling
place in volcanic caves.

Boiling blood, like magma, circulates
through its body. It makes its dwelling
place in volcanic caves.

Its body is made of rugged steel.
However, it is partially melted in
spots because of its own heat.

Its body is made of rugged steel.
However, it is partially melted in
spots because of its own heat.

Its body is made of rugged steel.
However, it is partially melted in
spots because of its own heat.

Its body is made of rugged steel.
However, it is partially melted in
spots because of its own heat.

It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its
body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its
body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling
magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds
many mysteries.
